DNA: Pieces of DNA to build a Dinosaur.

Recipe: DNA Requirements of a known dinosaur.

Cold Storage: Cooler size you can hold DNA.

Entrance: Doesn't count as in your park.

Zones: Available zones to build attraction's or exhibit's.

Excitement Level: How much fun people feel at your park.

Security Level: How secure your park is compared to fun.

Plot Twists: Little twists on gameplay for uniqueness.

Market Row: Each row is a starting $ value.

Actions: One scientist at a time until each player has three turns.

Add that many DNAs to your lab
You can never have more than Cold Storage

Icons: Dinosaur Icon or Scientist Icon on dice must be claimed by scientist number 3.
You only get the benefit once.
You do not multiply the sciences research level

Icons (cont.): Dinosaur Icon allows you to upgrade the padlock capacity.
Scientist Icon allows you to gain one worker from the supply.

Increase Cold Storage: Assign a scientist to one of the six slots of the research center.
Immediately increase cold storage by a number equal to that scientist research level on any combination of tracks.

Take Dino Recipe: The number indicates minimum research level of scientist to get recipe.
Immediately place the tile in two available zones.

Pass: Move remaining scientists to worker pool.

End Research Phase: After everybody's three turns evaluate the dice.
Take the die with the most pips and move it to the holding area.
This will be added to all players threat level during Park Phase.

Hire specialist: cost = Market Row (immediately carry out the effects).
You may fire one to replace, discarding from the game (Giving up bonuses).

Build attraction: Immediately place it an available zone

By lab upgrade: cost = Market Row (Immediately place in Lab
Replaced lab upgrades have no effect

Special lab upgrade: These are upgrades to basic lab action must be placed on top of basic corresponding action

Buy DNA: Gain corresponding number of DNA(s) as the Market Board
Discard corresponding number item from Market Row

Worker Phase: Assign each worker to a lab action
Each worker slot can be activated once per round
Green background lab tiles are passive abilities not by workers

Refining DNA: Spend two Basic DNA for one Advanced DNA

Creating dinosaurs: Dino research lab upgrade tiles allow you to create dinosaurs
Must have capacity in the Exhibit

Threat level increases by pips on the re: At threat 11 grab +10 marker and go to one

Increasing security: Lab upgrade tiles can increase security
If your Security level reaches 11 grab +10 marker and go to one
Security Level above 10 costs $5 per Level
If Security Level < Threat Level Dinosaurs will eat visitors.

Upgrading Exhibit capacity: Each Exhibit can hold one dinosaur
Upgrade one Exhibit for the next level

Venture capital: Upgraded tile allows you to collect money
Assign worker collect money from slot

Attract Visitors: In turn order, draw number of Visitors from the bag = Excitement Level

Manage lines, simultaneously: Place all visitors at Attractions and Exhibits
Exhibits hold Visitors = count of Dinosaurs
Any unplaced Visitors are stuck at the Entrance

Threat level: Check your base threat level in your lab
Add pips from Dice that was set aside a Phase 1

Eat Visitors: You choose Park Patron/Hooligans to eat
Patrons must be eaten before Hooligans

Eat Visitors (cont.): If whole park eaten, eat Patron/Hooligans from the Entrance
You can't go below zero VP

Put all eaten visitors back in the bag: 1VP per surviving Patron not at Entrance.
or, optionally $2 per Patron at a Food Attraction.
Do not score for the Entrance.

Resetting turn order: Fewest VP becomes first player in order.
Ties are broken by previous round order.

Refresh the market: Fill empty items from corresponding stack.
Do not rearrange by cost that is initial set up only

Reveal new Recipes: Any facedown Recipe stack turn top tile up.

Resolve plot twist: Look for plot twist that resolved at end of round.

Objectives: At any moment the objective is met, claim with Corporation Token
Other players can claim during the same phase

Game End: Game ends when there is one objective card unclaimed

Scoring: Add VP for Attractions and Exhibits
Exhibits multiplied VP by the number of Dinosaurs
